title: decoded script
extract: In philology, decipherment is the discovery of the meaning of texts written in ancient or obscure languages or scripts. Decipherment in cryptography refers to decryption. ... In genetics, decipherment is the successful attempt to understand DNA, which is viewed metaphorically as a text containing word-like units.
extract_html: In philology, decipherment is the discovery of the meaning of texts written in ancient or obscure languages or scripts. Decipherment in cryptography refers to decryption. ... In genetics, decipherment is the successful attempt to understand DNA, which is viewed metaphorically as a text containing word-like units.
